arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the discoverer.

content.description: The schema specification. Must be a valid Open API 3.0 spec.

description.description: The description of the schema. Maximum of 256 characters.

lastModified.description: The last modified date of the schema.

name.description: The name of the schema. Maximum of 385 characters consisting of lower case letters, upper case letters, ., -, _, @.

registryName.description: The name of the registry in which this schema belongs.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

type.description: The type of the schema. Valid values: `OpenApi3` or `JSONSchemaDraft4`.

versionCreatedDate.description: The created date of the version of the schema.
